attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these CFL bulbs are filled with mercury vapour, which is extremely hazardous.  the light they produce exacerbates skin conditions such as eczema. they save a bit of money, but if you break one, you have to evacuate the house and clean up the bits with a face-mask on. they are deadly poisonous, and the light is feeble anyway.
